overview: When a series of customers who run a small hair salon start to run out, they are shaken by the gangster's suggestion to run the hair salon as a decadent business. After seeing a sales method that allows her customers to freely touch female employees while receiving services such as shampoo, she leaves the salon, but a few months later, she suffers from the hardships of her life and goes back to find her gangster.
title: The day my aunt's hair salon closes
